court: RFA No.3996 of 1992(O&M) IN THE HIGH COURT OF PUNJAB & HARYANA, CHANDIGARH RFA No.3996 of 1992 Date of decision August 31, 2012 Aya Singh (deceased)through L.Rs ....... Appellants Versus State of Punjab and others ........ Respondents CORAM: HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE K. KANNAN Present:- Mr. R. S. Manhas, Advocate for the appellants **** . Whether reporters of local papers may be allowed to see the judgment ? No . To be referred to the reporters or not? No . Whether the judgment should be reported in the digest?No K. Kannan, J (oral). CM No.6252-CI of 2012 The application is allowed subject to all just exceptions Legal representatives of the deceased- appellant are ordered to be brought on record. Registry is directed to make necessary amendment in the Memo of Parties. CM No.6253-CI of 2012 The application is allowed. The deficiency in making the court fee is made good. RFA No.3996 of 1992(O&M) . The appeal is for enhancement of compensation at the instance of the claimants. The counsel states that the subject matter of appeal for acquisition of property through a notification is covered by a decision rendered by this Court in relation to the very same notification in RFA No.2806 of 1992. This Court has determined the compensation of `13,000/- per acre for the lands barani, salab and salab river and `10,000/- per acre for other kinds of land. The award passed already by the Reference Court shall stand modified in reference to above. . The appeal is allowed to the above extent. (K. KANNAN) JUDGE August 31, 2012 archana
